channel.title: Simple question easy to awnser but im stupid so i dont know
channel.description: Right all i want to know is. How do you add pictures of your server to a thread on advertisements. Because I have tried and just can't do it. Person who tells me will get a free admin on my server. XD[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 01:22:28 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Simple question easy to awnser but im stupid so i dont know
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Ugh
IF you want an attachment picute on the bottom when your posting click more options and there is an attachment bar

IF you want them BIG and BLATENT host them on a site like photobucket then click on the insert image icon and put the address of it, in those

item.title: Simple question easy to awnser but im stupid so i dont know
item.dc:creator: @chewwie chewwie
item.description:
@chewwie wrote:

you just take the picture normally by pressing print screen which is next to f12, then save it to my pictures, to go http://imageshack.us/ upload it, copy the address then paste it within the [img][img] code.
